course_title: Special Topics: Data Analytics for Fin Bus Dec
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 66 / Seats Avail: 13Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: An ideal employee in today's data driven world not only has an in depth knowledge of their subject area but is also well skilled in working with Big Data. In this course, we will work to develop the data analytics mindset that is needed for making financial business decisions. We will learn how to extract, manipulate, and analyze useful information from large financial datasets. This course is designed to help students think critically about financial data and how it can best be leveraged to aid in business decision making. The course primarily uses Python along with some Excel. No prior coding experience is needed. ISOM 352 is highly recommended.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W300
